# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(mccm LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(mccm "")
set_target_properties(mccm PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "mccm")
set_target_properties(mccm PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(mccm PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(mccm PRIVATE
    C:/Users/liu01/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/c/coost/v3.0.0/8740acc100024f88bd62575f6add4dcd/include
    C:/Users/liu01/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/l/libcurl/7.87.0/a2ac3a70b1e948b1843919b4cbb41b7f/include
    C:/Users/liu01/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/o/openssl/1.1.1-t/9458079689e342b58f2f2e8d4b2fb860/include
)
target_compile_definitions(mccm PRIVATE
    CURL_STATICLIB
)
target_compile_options(mccm PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_FRONTEND_VARIANT STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(mccm PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(mccm PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(mccm PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(mccm PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(mccm PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(mccm PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(mccm PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET mccm PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(mccm PRIVATE
    co
    libcurl
    libssl
    libcrypto
    advapi32
    crypt32
    wldap32
    winmm
    ws2_32
    user32
)
target_link_directories(mccm PRIVATE
    C:/Users/liu01/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/c/coost/v3.0.0/8740acc100024f88bd62575f6add4dcd/lib
    C:/Users/liu01/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/l/libcurl/7.87.0/a2ac3a70b1e948b1843919b4cbb41b7f/lib
    C:/Users/liu01/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/o/openssl/1.1.1-t/9458079689e342b58f2f2e8d4b2fb860/lib
)
target_sources(mccm PRIVATE
    src/main.cxx
    src/impl/test.cxx
)
